text: Abdallah Said (; born 13 July 1985) is an Egyptian football player. He is an attacking midfielder. He plays for Egyptian Premier League club Zamalek. He also plays in the Egyptian national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Team Season League Cup Continental Other Total Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Ismaily 2003–04 2 0 1 0 0 0 0 0 3 0 Ismaily 2004–05 3 0 0 0 0 0 — 2 0 Ismaily 2005–06 14 4 3 0 0 0 0 0 17 4 Ismaily 2006–07 24 7 3 0 0 0 0 0 27 7 Ismaily 2007–08 27 5 0 0 0 0 1 0 28 5 Ismaily 2008–09 29 9 0 0 1 0 0 0 30 9 Ismaily 2009–10 15 3 0 0 4 0 — 19 3 Ismaily 2010–11 26 8 1 0 0 0 — 27 8 Ismaily Total 140 36 8 0 20 2 7 5 180 44 Al Ahly 2010–11 0 0 1 0 0 0 — 1 0 Al Ahly 2011–12 15 4 0 0 12 1 4 1 31 6 Al Ahly 2012–13 14 0 0 0 15 2 2 0 31 2 Al Ahly 2013–14 17 9 0 0 8 1 — 25 10 Al Ahly 2014–15 29 6 5 4 12 3 1 2 47 15 Al Ahly 2015–16 30 11 3 1 5 1 1 0 39 13 Al Ahly 2016–17 28 10 2 0 13 2 2 0 45 12 Al Ahly 2017–18 21 10 0 0 1 2 — 22 12 Al Ahly Total 154 50 11 5 66 12 10 3 241 70 KuPS 2018 7 0 0 0 — 7 0 KuPS Total 7 0 0 0 — 7 0 Al-Ahli 2018–19 14 2 0 0 0 0 0 0 14 2 Al-Ahli Total 14 2 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 Pyramids 2018–19 18 4 3 0 — 21 4 Pyramids 2019–20 25 17 1 0 12 4 — 38 21 Pyramids 2020–21 26 6 2 1 9 3 — 37 10 Pyramids 2021–22 31 6 5 0 10 0 — 46 6 Pyramids 2022–23 18 1 1 0 9 3 0 0 28 4 Pyramids 2023–24 8 2 0 0 4 0 4 0 16 2 Pyramids Total 126 36 12 1 44 10 4 0 186 47 Zamalek 2022–23 0 0 1 0 0 0 0 0 1 0 Zamalek 2023–24 19 5 1 1 0 0 0 0 20 6 Zamalek 2024–25 0 0 0 0 1 1 1 0 2 1 Zamalek Total 19 5 2 1 1 1 1 0 23 7 ===International=== :Statistics accurate as of match played 6 February 2022.
